headline.main: STANISLAVSKY DIES IN MOSCOW AT 75; Co-founder of the Moscow Art Theatre One of the Greatest Masters of Russian Drama HAD STAGED FIFTY PLAYS Was Actor, Producer, Teacher, Philosopher of Theatre--He Appeared Here 1923-24 Co-Founder of Art Theatre Natural Setting Disquieting Group Performed in United States

snippet: Constantin Sergeivitch Stanislavsky, one of the greatest masters of Russian drama and a founder of the Moscow Art Theatre, died here today of -a heart ailment.
